name: Tanked (Dorukyum)
description:
Tanked Battle your friends in a tank - either in a maze or open space!

Tanked is a local multiplayer game (inspired by "AZ Tank Game") in which your goal is to fire bullets that bounce off walls and kill the opponent tank.

Player 1 (blue) is controlled with the WASD keys and fires with the Shift key while Player 2 (red) is controlled with the arrow keys and fires with the Alt (or Alt Gr) key.

Upcoming:
  • Powerups
  • Battlefield Gamemode
